original_command: \wmic.exe -format Format:List Format:htable Format:hform Format:table Format:mof Format:value Format:rawxml Format:xml Format:csv

evasions.insertion: \wmic.exe -format Format:List Format:htable Format:hform Format:table "F""o""r""m""a""t"":""m""o""f" Format:value Format:rawxml Format:xml Format:csv
evasions.substitution: \wmic.exe -format Format:List Format:htable Format:hform Format:table Format:mof Format:value Format:rawxml Format:xml Format:csv #substitution
evasions.omission: \wmic -format Format:List Format:htable Format:hform Format:table Format:mof Format:value Format:rawxml Format:xml Format:csv
evasions.reordering: \wmic.exe -format Format:List Format:htable Format:hform Format:table Format:mof Format:value Format:rawxml Format:xml Format:csv
